   19: %%
   20: -module(error_handler_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0,suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1,end_per_suite/1,
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   24: 	 undefined_function_handler/1]).
   25: 
   26: %% Callback from error_handler.
   27: -export(['$handle_undefined_function'/2]).
   28: 
   29: suite() ->
   30:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   31:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   32: 
   33: all() ->
   34:     [undefined_function_handler].
   35: 
   36: groups() ->
   37:     [].
   38: 
   39: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   40:     Config.
   41: 
   42: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   43:     ok.
   44: 
   45: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   46:     Config.
   47: 
   48: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   49:     Config.
   50: 
   51: 
   52: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
   53: 
   54: undefined_function_handler(_) ->
   55:     42 = ?MODULE:forty_two(),
   56:     42 = (id(?MODULE)):forty_two(),
   57:     {ok,{a,b,c}} = ?MODULE:one_arg({a,b,c}),
   58:     {ok,{a,b,c}} = (id(?MODULE)):one_arg({a,b,c}),
   59:     {'EXIT',{undef,[{?MODULE,undef_and_not_handled,[[1,2,3]],[]}|_]}} =
   60: 	(catch ?MODULE:undef_and_not_handled([1,2,3])),
   61:     ok.
   62: 
   63: '$handle_undefined_function'(forty_two, []) ->
   64:     42;
   65: '$handle_undefined_function'(one_arg, [Arg]) ->
   66:     {ok,Arg};
   67: '$handle_undefined_function'(Func, Args) ->
   68:     error_handler:raise_undef_exception(?MODULE, Func, Args).
   69: 
   70: id(I) ->
   71:     I.
